root: ^Still in search of answeres Nolwazi realizes that it might be a lot harder than she thought as the people do not understand her nor her them.
^Nolwazi: Maybe I should just try and pick up for names that sound familiar.
^Nolwazi overhears a conversation about a Leader
^Young Boy: I hope the Moziki leader will make Tshomba Tsha Kabiola. Nazali na elikya ete mokambi akosala Tshomba Tsha Kabiola yango.
